description_0: Inside view of a cave, showing the outside with a waterfall covering the entryway. The view is from a low angle and inside shoes a rocky formation that is structured as an archway that leads to the outside, near the right of the wall is darker from the lighting. The water comes from above and leaves down multiple streams over the archway, and the water looks like frozen icicles based on the thin cone shape. Behind the water is a partial view of the top of trees, with yellow-green leaves and a blue sky beyond them.
description_1: An indoor view of a Coconut tree and a pineapple behind it. A small hole is underneath the tree's base. The coconut tree has a base depicting sand and the tree trunk is golden brown. Behind the tree is a yellow pineapple with three small brown "V"s on the front of it. Both items are sitting on top of a gray desk. A metal tray is holding construction papers. The tray is sitting on top of a black platform. The papers are white, blue, pink, yellow, and purple. Beside the tree is a green plant set in the floor that is partially cut off from view. Both the tree and pineapple have a green top. Sunlight is shining through open blinds and onto the desk. Daytime.
